name: Serena Williams
achievement: 23 Grand Slam singles titles, most by any woman in the Open Era
challenge: Racial prejudice and sexism throughout her career
quote: The success of our careers is not built by ourselves. It is built by all the people who support us - the coaches, the parents, the friends, the mentors. You need a village.

name: Michael Jordan
achievement: Widely regarded as the greatest basketball player of all time
challenge: Cut from his high school basketball team in his sophomore year
quote: I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I fail all the time. That's why I succeed.

name: Simone Biles
achievement: Most decorated gymnast in World Championship history
challenge: Opened up about her struggles with mental health
quote: I wasn't born fearless. I take a deep breath and I tell myself 'You got this.'

name: Lionel Messi
achievement: Seven-time Ballon d'Or winner, most in history
challenge: Growth hormone deficiency in his childhood
quote: You have to fight to reach your dream. You have to sacrifice and work hard to achieve it.

name: Stephen Curry
achievement: Revolutionized the game of basketball with his long-range shooting
challenge: Doubted early in his career for his slender frame
quote: I don't try to avoid the hard work. I run towards it.

name: Usain Bolt
achievement: Eight-time Olympic gold medalist, holder of several world records
challenge: Overcame a scoliosis diagnosis in his childhood
quote: Anything is possible if you set your mind to it and put in the hard work.

name: Wilma Rudolph
achievement: Overcame polio as a child to win three gold medals at the 1960 Olympics
challenge: Polio left her partially paralyzed as a child
quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.

name: Tom Brady
achievement: Seven-time Super Bowl champion, most by any player
challenge: Drafted in the sixth round despite his talent
quote: There's nothing wrong with being doubted. In fact, it can be a great motivator.

name: Michelle Kwan
achievement: Five-time World Champion and nine-time US National Champion
challenge: Overcame chronic asthma throughout her career
quote: Challenges are what make life interesting. Overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
